text: Hederopsis major is a species of plant in the family Araliaceae. It is a tree endemic to Peninsular Malaysia. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== * World Conservation Monitoring Centre 1998. Hederopsis major. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 21 August 2007. title: Hederopsis major
